comment: BREAKING: UK has reported a case of coronavirus in Liverpool. If this disease gets into Nigeria, Buhari will blame PDP.

@adeyanjudeji We release daily stats on coronavirus testing in the UK at 2PM (GMT), this can be found as the pinned tweet on our profile.As of 2pm on Wednesday 29 January 2020, a total of 130 tests have concluded and 130 were confirmed negative.Full information: https://t.co/VdU3Lzcrhl
